Articles.Content: What are some good mods, for fairings, i just installed FAR, and i want to still launch payloads.

KW has absolutely incredible fairings that don't mess up your staging with five million decouplers (looking at you, NovaPunch and Fairing Factory!), but they can be a little restrictive, and sometimes you have to use a ridiculously overlength fairing because your short-but-wide payload clips through the nosecone and you can't adjust it as much as you'd like.

NovaPunch has easy-to-use, reasonably versatile fairings, but to be honest, they're kind of ugly and they fill your staging list with decouplers that you don't need.

Fairing Factory is undeniably the most versatile way to get fairings, and they look good. However, it can be a bit tedious making a custom fairing for your oddly-shaped payload, especially since getting a reference can be a bit difficult, and every part is a decoupler, which means that you get your staging list filled with useless decouplers, just like with NovaPunch. Also, you need to modify the .cfgs to make them work in 0.20.x.
Ok is there a way to get just the fairing part of KW?

Ok is there a way to get just the fairing part of KW?

Download the whole thing and just delete the parts you don't want. But KW is generally a pretty great mod, you might find some of the tanks and engines quite useful.
The KW Rocketry fairings are excellent, and I'm rather impressed with the AIES Aerospace ones as well.
